mapper.select: SELECT ASSET_IDX , USER_IDX , ASSET_ORDER , ASSET_TYPE , CONNECTION_ASSET_IDX , ASSET_NAME , INITIAL_AMOUNT, REG_DATE FROM ASSET WHERE ASSET_IDX = #{asset_idx} AND USER_IDX = #{user_idx}

SELECT ASSET_IDX , ASSET_ORDER , ASSET_TYPE , CONNECTION_ASSET_IDX , ASSET_NAME , INITIAL_AMOUNT , REG_DATE , CASE WHEN ASSET_TYPE = "현금" OR ASSET_TYPE = "신용" THEN (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='수입' THEN AMOUNT WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='지출' THEN -AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) FROM LEDGER L WHERE L.ASSET_IDX = A.ASSET_IDX AND L.USER_IDX = #{user_idx}) + A.INITIAL_AMOUNT WHEN ASSET_TYPE = "통장" THEN (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='수입' THEN AMOUNT WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='지출' THEN -AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) FROM LEDGER L WHERE L.ASSET_IDX = A.ASSET_IDX AND L.USER_IDX = #{user_idx}) + A.INITIAL_AMOUNT + (SELECT IF(COUNT(*)=0 , 0 , IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='수입' THEN AMOUNT WHEN INCOME_AND_EXPENSES='지출' THEN -AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) FROM LEDGER L JOIN ASSET JA ON L.ASSET_IDX = JA.ASSET_IDX WHERE JA.CONNECTION_ASSET_IDX = A.ASSET_IDX AND JA.ASSET_TYPE = "체크" AND L.USER_IDX = #{user_idx}) END AS BALANCE FROM ASSET A WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} ORDER BY ASSET_ORDER ASC;
SELECT ASSET_IDX, USER_IDX, ASSET_ORDER,ASSET_TYPE, CONNECTION_ASSET_IDX, ASSET_NAME, INITIAL_AMOUNT, REG_DATE FROM ASSET WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND ASSET_IDX = #{asset_idx}

SELECT ASSET_IDX, ASSET_ORDER FROM ASSET WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND ASSET_ORDER < (SELECT T.ASSET_ORDER FROM ASSET T WHERE T.USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND T.ASSET_IDX = #{asset_idx}) ORDER BY ASSET_ORDER DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT ASSET_IDX, ASSET_ORDER FROM ASSET WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND ASSET_ORDER > (SELECT T.ASSET_ORDER FROM ASSET T WHERE T.USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND T.ASSET_IDX = #{asset_idx}) ORDER BY ASSET_ORDER LIMIT 1
SELECT ASSET_IDX, ASSET_NAME FROM ASSET WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} AND ASSET_TYPE = "통장" ORDER BY ASSET_ORDER
SELECT ASSET_ORDER FROM ASSET WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx} ORDER BY ASSET_ORDER DESC LIMIT 1
